descriptions.songAnnouncements: Wether the bot should announce every song when it starts playing it.
descriptions.prefix: The prefix that is used to trigger commands. Alternatively, you can use a ping with a space after it.
descriptions.pfp: What profile picture the bot should use. `default | dark | light | mono | <custom url>`
descriptions.locale: The preferred language of your server. For valid language codes please see the github repository.
